name: leaf-storm
effect: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user's Special Attack by two stages.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
A storm of sharp
leaves is whipped up.
The attack’s recoil
sharply reduces the
user’s Sp. Atk stat.

leaves is whipped up.
The attack’s recoil
sharply reduces the
user’s Sp. Atk stat.
